  • Subscriptions
  • provisioningSessionChanged

provisioningSessionChanged

Subscribe to provisioning session state changes

provisioningSessionChanged(
  routerId: ID!
): ProvisioningSession!

Arguments​

provisioningSessionChanged.routerId ● ID! non-null scalar​

Router ID to filter by

Type​

ProvisioningSession object​

Provisioning session encapsulates the entire setup workflow for a router. Manages state transitions from initial setup through resource configuration to final apply on the router.

Previous
portMirrorChanged
Next
provisioningSessionProgress
